title: Ruthless Surrender
description: I know her darkest secret and am just ruthless enough to use it against her. Whether she likes it or not, Iâ€™m the only one who can help her, but I do nothing for free. My price is her complete surrender. She can hate me all she wants, as long as she pays with her body. And if she tries to run? That will just cost her more.
author: Zoe Blake
